name: Simple Fisherman
description:
Simple fisherman is my first completed game. As the title suggests, it's a simple fishing game made with the RPG Maker MV engine. You take on the role of 'John', the grandson of legendary fisherman Robert Fisher. Although your grandfather was a legend in his time, you've only ever been a simple fisherman yourself. Is it finally time for you to step into the shoes of your grandfather?

  • Retro graphic style makes for a fun nostalgic experience
  • Secrets await you on the island of Robert Fisher's legacy
  • Fish, fish and fish some more to unlock better rods!
  • Catch a big fish? The local sailor will pay good money for bigger fish.
  • Unlock new titles along the way along with buffs and more.
